song_lyrics: Bansarī bajaiyā Kā’n, mere gher āyo... ṭek
Bhūṣhan vasan dhārī, vege āyo Girdhārī,
Moralī me mīṭhī rāganī sunāyo... bansarī 1
Lagyo he tumāro dhyān, bhaī me to ek tān,
Rasīk mohan moye, kanṭhasu lagāyo... bansarī 2
Tan karyo tum kāj, chhoḍī sab lok lāj,
Adhar sudhāso pyāre, prem karī pāyo... bansarī 3
Tumahīse prīt jorī, or sabahī se torī,
Muktānand ehī māge, nehaku nībhāyo... bansarī 4
title: Bansarī bajaiyā Kā’n mere gher āyo

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1125: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Prabhatiya
